description:
nova-novncproxy uses rpc, but is not eventlet monkey_patched.  This is required for using rpc.  This caused it to break during testing when setting amqp_rpc_single_reply_queue=True for some reason.

Note that this is already fixed in master (havana), by accident, when switching commands to use entry points.  It's done in nova/cmd/__init__.py now.
title: nova-novncproxy and nova-spicehtml5proxy use rpc but is not eventlet patched

comments.content:
nova-novncproxy uses rpc, but is not eventlet monkey_patched.  This is required for using rpc.  This caused it to break during testing when setting amqp_rpc_single_reply_queue=True for some reason.

Note that this is already fixed in master (havana), by accident, when switching commands to use entry points.  It's done in nova/cmd/__init__.py now.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/grizzly
